long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every day you view websites, that are highly engineered to be more addictive. The websites Sparkle! 

It's our goal to undo that polished engineering - Stop the Sparkle!

Stop the Sparkle allows you to view websites in a less addictive way. This is accomplished by adding filters to websites you choose in order to make the website uglier!

Key Features:
Fight back against big tech: Against the thousands of tech employees who make websites addictive. 
View your content: Just in a less addictive view. 
Select specific websites: Websites you choose will become less pleasing to the eye
Select specific filters: If any filters are too bothersome, you can turn them off in the extension settings.

Beta Information:
Stop the Sparkle is currently in beta development. We would love to hear from you about how to make our product better. Please email us at DevStopTheSparkle@gmail.com

Privacy:
Zero data leaves your browser. Data collection is icky and we don't do that.
